meanings.definition: An elevated, enclosed walkway connecting two buildings
meanings.sent1: The skywalks between the buildings provide a safe way to cross the street.
meanings.sent2: I used the skywalks to avoid traffic while moving from one building to another.
meanings.sent3: The skywalks make it feel like you're walking in the air!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a network of skywalks, connecting different thoughts and ideas.
meanings.sent5: The glass skywalks offer a breathtaking view of the city below.

meanings.definition: To walk on an elevated, enclosed walkway above ground level
meanings.sent1: She skywalks between the buildings to reach her office quickly.
meanings.sent2: People often skywalks to avoid crowded streets during rush hour.
meanings.sent3: He skywalks gracefully, as if dancing in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The cat skywalks along the fence, balancing effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The astronaut skywalks in space, tethered to the spacecraft.
